purpose: The email announces two postdoc positions available at King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM) in Saudi Arabia. The positions focus on Secure Software Development/Software Security and Artificial Intelligence in Software Engineering. They are for a duration of two years, with a potential extension based on performance. Applicants should have a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, and current postdoc holders are encouraged to apply. Interested candidates are invited to send their CV or inquiries to Prof. Mohammad Alshayeb.

evidence_sentences: We are seeking applications for two postdoc positions in the areas of Secure Software Development/Software Security and Artificial Intelligence in Software Engineering.
The positions are for two years, with the possibility of extension for an additional two years based on performance and mutual agreement.
Applicants must have, or be near the completion of, a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a closely related field.
Candidates currently holding postdoc positions are also encouraged to apply.
Interested candidates are invited to send their CV or direct any inquiries to: Prof. Mohammad Alshayeb.
